Cardio

Cardiovascular exercise, or cardio, is essential for maintaining heart health and overall fitness. By raising your heart rate, cardio exercises improve lung capacity, increase blood circulation, and enhance endurance. Whether you're looking to improve stamina, lose weight, or simply boost your energy levels, cardio offers a wide range of health benefits. It also aids in the regulation of cholesterol levels and blood pressure, making it an important component of any fitness routine. From high-impact activities like running to low-impact exercises like cycling, cardio can be adapted to suit various fitness levels and preferences.
